name: ZonalStatistics
description: Summarizes the values of a raster within the zones of another dataset.

parameters.name: inputZoneRasterOrFeatures
parameters.description: The input that defines the boundaries of the zones, or areas.

parameters.name: zoneField
parameters.description: The field that contains the values that define each zone.

parameters.name: inputValueRaster
parameters.description: The dataset that contains the cell values that will be used to calculate statistics.

parameters.name: outputName
parameters.description: The name of the zonal statistics raster layer that will be created.

parameters.name: statisticType
parameters.description: Specifies the statistic type that will be calculated.

parameters.name: percentileValue
parameters.description: Specifies the percentile value that will be calculated.

parameters.name: percentileInterpolationType
parameters.description: Specifies the method that will be used when the number of values from the input raster to be calculated is an even number.

parameters.name: circularCalculation
parameters.description: Specifies how the Input value raster cell values will be processed for circular data.  False—Ordinary arithmetic (linear) statistics will be calculated.   True—Circular statistics will be calculated.

parameters.name: circularWrapValue
parameters.description: Specifies the value that will be used to round a linear value to the range of a given circular statistic.

parameters.name: ignoreNodata
parameters.description: Specifies whether NoData cells in the Input value raster will be ignored in the results of the zones they fall within.  True—NoData cells in the value raster will be ignored in the statistic calculation.  False—NoData cells will not be ignored, and the entire zone will receive the NoData value on the output raster.

parameters.name: processAsMultidemensional
parameters.description: Specifies how the input rasters will be processed if they are multidimensional.  False—The statistics will be calculated from the current slice of the input multidimensional dataset.  True—The statistics will be calculated for all dimensions of the input multidimensional dataset.
